mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: AgriConnect is on a mission to revolutionize the farm-to-table journey. By directly connecting farmers with consumers, we ensure transparency, fair trade, and sustainable practices that benefit everyone in the food supply chain.
mission.paragraph2: We champion local agriculture, digital empowerment, and a greener planet—making fresh, high-quality produce accessible to all while supporting rural livelihoods and innovation.

highlights.title: Why AgriConnect Stands Out
highlights.feature1: Direct farmer-to-buyer connections for transparent, commission-free negotiations.
highlights.feature2: Marketplace for seamless buying and selling of farm produce and goods.
highlights.feature3: Secure, modern technology stack (MERN) with robust authentication and privacy controls.
highlights.feature4: Designed for accessibility, mobile-first and desktop-ready, with a beautiful and intuitive UI.

developer.bio: Passionate about building impactful digital solutions for agriculture, sustainability, and communities. Dedicated to clean code, modern design, and user-first experiences.
developer.mission: My mission is to empower farmers, vendors, and consumers through intuitive, reliable, and scalable technology. I believe in bridging the gap between traditional agriculture and modern digital tools to foster transparency, efficiency, and growth for all stakeholders.
developer.collab: This project is open for collaboration, feedback, and contributions. Let's build a sustainable future together—one line of code at a time.

values.title: Our Values
values.sustainability.description: Promoting eco-friendly farming practices and reducing food miles
values.transparentConnections.description: Connecting farmers and buyers directly for transparent, commission-free negotiations.
values.qualityAssurance.description: Rigorous quality checks to ensure the best products
values.farmerSupport.description: Empowering farmers with fair prices and market access

register.title: Register
register.name: Name
register.usernameHelper: Choose a unique username. You can generate one automatically.
